/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Trees and streetlights punctuate the landscape, providing a sense of order amidst the urban chaos. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
